txt.en: 'You have found the brigands' hideaway, and that is a small victory for us. We must move quickly to render them useless to the Khundolar. They fancy themselves the lords of the Brown Lands... but whether this land holds any value or not, it belongs to the Lord of the Mark.\n\n'Let us deliver this message to the brigands at Helstor. Enter therein and defeat many of their fellows. That will be a harsh lesson to them, but an effective one, I think.'
'You have delivered a mighty blow against the brigands, but not one strong enough to remove their threat, I wager.\n\n'Nevertheless, I thank you.'
'Have you dealt with the brigands yet?'
Ever since the Brown Lands became the barren waste-land they now are, brigands have used them for a hideaway from those who would seek to bring them to justice.
Brigands can be found at Helstor, north of Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nCéola has asked you to defeat brigands at their encampment in the Brown Lands.
Talk to Céola at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands, south of Helstor.\n\nYou should return to Céola with news of your success.
